org.apache.spark.rpc

Interface ThreadSafeRpcEndpoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RpcEndpoint

    public interface ThreadSafeRpcEndpoint
extends RpcEndpoint
    A trait that requires RpcEnv thread-safely sending messages to it.

    Thread-safety means processing of one message happens before processing of the next message by the same ThreadSafeRpcEndpoint. In the other words, changes to internal fields of a ThreadSafeRpcEndpoint are visible when processing the next message, and fields in the ThreadSafeRpcEndpoint need not be volatile or equivalent.

    However, there is no guarantee that the same thread will be executing the same ThreadSafeRpcEndpoint for different messages.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.spark.rpc.RpcEndpoint

        onConnected, onDisconnected, onError, onNetworkError, onStart, onStop, receive, receiveAndReply, rpcEnv, self, stop
